title: Looking at animals: elephants
creator_credit: Boulton-Hawker Films, Educational Foundation for Visual Aids and Peter Boulton
brief_description: A study of wild African elephants in their natural habitat. Asian elephants are then shown at work: carrying loads and, ceremoniously bedecked, taking part in an Indian festival. African and Indian elephants are compared and attention is drawn to their main points of difference.
creator_credit_for_label: Boulton-Hawker Films, Educational Foundation for Visual Aids and Peter Boulton
